text: Petrus Visagie (25 April 1922 - 1967) was a Kenyan sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre rifle, prone event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Kenyan male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Kenya Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Petrus Visagie
